I've never seen a draven draven except myself.

No news about bringing back dominion for customs so we can play hide and seek in peace instead of toxic normals/ranked?? Another disappointing year for League of Legends :/

Please give it back Riot! there is so many people begging for it to be back (just look at the NA and OCE forum when you announced its death without asking) NO BODY ASKED FOR THIS! please give it back. Its just a great way to have fun without pressures of winning and those times when you have bad internet, you can play without fear of a leaver buster or letting the team down. I shouldn't have to justify this :/ Theres only so many games of Summoners Rift or aram you can play until you get bored.

did they seriously just rename twitches ultimate spray and pray.
hahaha
That was its old name before we changed it to ratatatatatatatatata both names didn't do a good job of describing the ability so we reverted it to a name loved by twitch mains.
i miss expunge, lovely word to say.
should change his e back to expunge while you were at it
Just another clear example of not knowing what the people want.
Its what it used to be called.

TWITCH RANT- STOP F!@# WITH MY FAV CHAMP.
I have been playing twitch since season 1 and ever since the ward change you have manage to screw twitch up every season what is the reason behind twitch screw ups. Ok you wanted to deal with stealth because he is banned out in championships all the team NOT!
Ok ok I let the stealth slide but his slow really you had to touch the only defence he had???? Twitch original slow was an instant aoe slow this got him out of trouble when champs ran at him and it gave him enough time to stealth, so what you guys do hey not many people play twitch lets see we can minimize that even more lets make it so he has to aim that slow make him stop to cast it and make it so he can not hit everyone with it. Then laugh at him while he trys to live through the 6second delay he has while trying to go stealth so he lives, but wait he can not make it too his turret before his stealth runs out lets just run to the turret.
So now that you screwed with his defence lets see if we can really screw up is attack. So he needs the surprise attack so you walk around a corner ~~stealth~~ camouflage to kill the laner you do not have the surprise any more as he can see you and you are dead. Twitch lose to most adc unless he surprises them. And now he can not even stealth through the fight to drop aggro, not like it work that well any way you would have to stealth before the fight engage live for the 6 seconds and you was good.
His W was a good start I think after screwing it but would prefer to see the aoe slow back, it dose give him another button to press in team fights apart from R.
And maybe having his Q an instant cast would be a good move as well considering, you can see the !@#$ !@#$ while !@#$ camouflage now any !@#$ way. Or maybe even giving him an increase on the speed boost like eve.

INVISIBLE CHAMPS - Are the sweepers going to be able to see them???

Invisibility effects don't last long enough for users to move from one lane to another - And what champ can do that if you have ward with pink ward ? Twitch have not been able to do that since season 2.

But are well-suited for maneuvering in combat (whether that's to start a fight or reposition within one).-Like they had trouble before they all have gap closers apart from teemo and he is not stealth if he is moving. 

Turrets are the only entities that passively see through Invisibility, in line with their nature as safe havens. Yea so only fight near your turrets when vs the one's listed below. So at any time a invisibility used you should disengage from team fight because your it is too high a risk for your back line.


A LESS SHORT LIST The following stealth abilities are Invisibility effects:
Akali’s W - Twilight Shroud-In lane you back off in team fight you disengage.
Kha’Zix’s R - Void Assault-In lane you back off in team fight you disengage.
LeBlanc’s R - Mimic-She is almost dead but it would pay to back off in both.
Shaco’s Q - Deceive-In lane you back off in team fight you disengage.
Talon’s R - Shadow Assault-In lane you back off in team fight you disengage.
Teemo’s Passive - Guerilla Warfare (formerly “Camouflage”)-You see him you are all ready dead, you can not ward the whole map with 5 control wards.
Vayne’s R - Final Hour-In lane you back off in team fight you disengage.
Wukong’s W - Decoy-In lane you back off in team fight you disengage.

THE EFFECTED BY THE CHANGE - Really only one
Eve - No change.
Rengar - No change as he can jump on you while still out of vision, only change he can no longer use his R as an escape now.
Twitch - Every thing from engage and disengage that rat is dead. If You can get to him he is dead.

MY THOUGHTS
Roit made a mistake with the wards and are too stubben to say they were wrong and they should of roled them back to season 1 warding system.
And from reading this post it seems you want to fix the snow balling of the AD champs, but what about the Akali's What is going to stop her from snow balling. And after she fed from lane how do we deal with the fact that we wont be able to stop her from 2 shotting our apc and adc when we can not see her.
Is this the reason every BOT game I have been in tonight has had an akali in it ?????????
By the way your bots are stupid I camouflage with twitch and found unless they walked on top of him they would run up to the turret.

Riot has a long history of ignoring the community when it comes to things they change (remember the outrage when they replaced the HUD and everyone asked for the ability to toggle between the old and the new one?) As much as i feel your pain, our cry's will never be heard. 

Think its about time we get new management with this company and some new game designers. Someone that will actually listen to the community instead of just randomly changing things. Many people would be pleased to have dominion back in customs, urf, mana potions, clarity back in normals, the old HUD etc etc.

Easy GG then, even 2 inhibitors down means the nexus towers aren't ever gonna stop superminions. I personally think the tower revert is a bad idea which is going to lead into more easy game finishers and less comebacks
Backdoors wont be cool anymore because it'll be 1 shot the towers and then the nexus. :(

Ivern's ult can be controlled properly? Worlds biggest buff tbh.
lol

**I GOTCHU FAM UNIQUE Passive**: If your Partner is nearby, heal for 12% of the damage your Partner deals to champions and redirect 12% of the damage your Partner takes from champions to you as true damage (healing and damage redirection are reduced by 50% if you are ranged). (Champions can only be linked by one Knight’s Vow at a time.)

Well done Riot, Honestly.
You've managed to ruin all assassins ,counter play.? 
What side are you on? Did you forget the reason for Assassins?
Are you trying to make seasonal players who have worked hard on their champions and play styles non existent, oh sorry you want assassins to work even harder in-order for a noob to beat "us" on basic starter champions, Removal of DFG so we couldn't 2 Hit people. We press all abilities still 2 Hitting people. Its our job!
Please Remember the players and the vast majority of original people who played on NA servers because there wasn't Oceanic server, but we stuck it out threw thick and thin, we were also there! Who are you trying to impress? Are you more concerned on attracting new players rather than listening to your own? We are not riot staff but we helped grow the community as well as your employees shouldn't we have a say?
I understand that your trying to make it an even playing field but just think about it, Gross Gore is just Doing Vlogs now, His not playing Twisted Fate, all the new players watching youtube videos on how to play assassin champions are now meaningless, everyone is learning together but the original players will still pave the way and craft their methods faster than ANY new player could! So Who are really helping? I don't know if the game has peaked but when Bjergsen and Doublelift stop playing what then? When you lose the people who once loved you , now they hate you for never listening , will you be listening after the games on the decline, Too much power has gone to your head riot!
when can we get the chroma of poppy, i can not wait anymore.
Please dont ignore us again Riot, please just give back dominion for customs so we can play hide and seek
